trans-unit.source: Begins asynchronous call to monitor an ICloudTask collection until each of its members has reached a desired state at least once.
trans-unit.target: Begins asynchronous call to monitor an ICloudTask collection until each of its members has reached a desired state at least once.

trans-unit.source: The State of each ICloudTask instance is assumed to authoritative at the time of the call.
trans-unit.target: The State of each ICloudTask instance is assumed to authoritative at the time of the call.

trans-unit.source: Instances that are already at the desiredState are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Instances that are already at the desiredState are ignored.

trans-unit.source: The ICloudTask instances in the collection are treated as read-only.
trans-unit.target: The ICloudTask instances in the collection are treated as read-only.

trans-unit.source: No updates are made to any of these instances.
trans-unit.target: No updates are made to any of these instances.

trans-unit.source: This means that when the call completes (timeout or not) the ICloudTask instances should be refreshed before using.
trans-unit.target: This means that when the call completes (timeout or not) the ICloudTask instances should be refreshed before using.

trans-unit.source: True if the WaitAll timed out, false if it did not.
trans-unit.target: True if the WaitAll timed out, false if it did not.
